relproducts.title: Harper Burnt Orange - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: This beautiful array of shades is the perfect tonic if you're shopping for some vibrant and zesty roman blinds that will bring your interior to life. A welcome sense of calm is introduced by the shades of grey and light blue that really help set the tone. The living room will transform itself into the heart of the home when you pair this offering from the harper range with some light blue walls and a selection of orange and yellow accessories.

relproducts.title: Malta Charcoal Curtain
relproducts.description: Malta is one of their most popular fabric collections. Malta charcoal is a dark, statement grey shade. An elegant hue that will work well with modern grey interiors. Grey is a stylish choice, and a trend that's not looking to go anywhere just yet. This fabric is beautiful for living rooms, dining rooms or bedrooms. Their made to measure curtains are all handmade within the uk and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.

relproducts.title: Urban Metallic Limestone Curtain
relproducts.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom. Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. A medium grey shade, urban limestone allows the addition of a soft grey-toned fabric without being too dark or over-bearing. Perfect for retaining a light and airy theme whilst adding some colour.
